verses.verse: And it came to pass <WH120>, when men began <WH2490> to multiply <WH7231> on <WH5921> the face <WH6440> of the ground <WH127>, and daughters <WH1323> were born unto them <WH3205>,

that the sons <WH1121> of God <WH430> saw <WH7200> the daughters <WH1323> of men <WH120> that they <WH2007> were fair <WH2896>; and they took <WH3947> them wives <WH802> of all that they chose <WH977>.

And Jehovah <WH3068> said <WH559>, My Spirit <WH7307> shall not strive <WH1777> with man <WH120> for ever <WH5769>, for that he also <WH1571> is flesh <WH1320>: yet shall his days <WH3117> be a hundred <WH3967> and twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141>.

The Nephilim <WH5303> were in the earth <WH776> in those days <WH3117>, and also after <WH310> that <WH3651>, when <WH834> the sons <WH1121> of God <WH430> came in <WH935> unto the daughters <WH1323> of men <WH120>, and they bare <WH3205> children to them <WH1992>: the same were the mighty men <WH582> that were of old <WH5769>, the men <WH582> of renown <WH8034>.

And Jehovah <WH3068> saw <WH7200> that the wickedness <WH7451> of man <WH120> was great <WH7227> in the earth <WH776>, and that every imagination <WH3336> of the thoughts <WH4284> of his heart <WH3820> was only <WH7535> evil <WH7451> continually <WH3117>.
And it repented <WH5162> Jehovah <WH3068> that he had made <WH6213> man <WH120> on the earth <WH776>, and it grieved <WH6087> him at <WH413> his heart <WH3820>.

And Jehovah <WH3068> said <WH559>, I will destroy <WH4229> man <WH120> whom I have created <WH1254> from the face <WH6440> of the ground <WH127>; both man <WH120>, and <WH5704> beast <WH929>, and creeping things <WH7431>, and birds <WH5775> of the heavens <WH8064>; for it repenteth <WH5162> me that I have made them <WH6213>.
But Noah <WH5146> found <WH4672> favor <WH2580> in the eyes <WH5869> of Jehovah <WH3068>.

These are the generations <WH8435> of Noah <WH5146>. Noah <WH5146> was a righteous <WH6662> man <WH376>, and perfect <WH8549> in his generations <WH1755>: Noah <WH5146> walked <WH1980> with God <WH430>.
And Noah <WH5146> begat <WH3205> three <WH7969> sons <WH1121>, Shem <WH8035>, Ham <WH2526>, and Japheth <WH3315>.
And the earth <WH776> was corrupt <WH7843> before <WH6440> God <WH430>, and the earth <WH776> was filled <WH4390> with violence <WH2555>.
And God <WH430> saw <WH7200> the earth <WH776>, and <WH7843>, behold, it was corrupt; for all flesh <WH1320> had corrupted <WH7843> their way <WH1870> upon the earth <WH776>.

And God <WH430> said <WH559> unto Noah <WH5146>, The end <WH7093> of all flesh <WH1320> is come <WH935> before me <WH6440>; for the earth <WH776> is filled with <WH4390> violence <WH2555> through them <WH6440>; and <WH7843>, behold, I will destroy them with <WH854> the earth <WH776>.

Make <WH6213> thee an ark <WH8392> of gopher <WH1613> wood <WH6086>; rooms <WH7064> shalt thou make <WH6213> in <WH854> the ark <WH8392>, and shalt pitch <WH3722> it within <WH1004> and without <WH2351> with pitch <WH3724>.

And this is how thou shalt make <WH6213> it <WH753>: the length of the ark <WH8392> three <WH7969> hundred <WH3967> cubits <WH520>, the breadth <WH7341> of it fifty <WH2572> cubits <WH520>, and the height <WH6967> of it thirty <WH7970> cubits <WH520>.

A light shalt thou make <WH6213> to the ark <WH8392>, and to a cubit <WH520> shalt thou finish <WH3615> it upward <WH4605>; and the door <WH6607> of the ark <WH8392> shalt thou set <WH7760> in the side thereof <WH6654>; with lower <WH8482>, second <WH8145>, and third <WH7992> stories shalt thou make it <WH6213>.

And I <WH589>, behold <WH2009>, I <WH589> do bring <WH935> the flood <WH3999> of waters <WH4325> upon the earth <WH776>, to destroy <WH7843> all flesh <WH1320>, wherein is the breath <WH7307> of life <WH2416>, from under <WH8478> heaven <WH8064>; everything <WH3605> that is in the earth <WH776> shall die <WH1478>.

But I will establish <WH6965> my covenant <WH1285> with thee <WH935>; and thou shalt come into <WH413> the ark <WH8392>, thou <WH859>, and thy sons <WH1121>, and thy wife <WH802>, and thy sons <WH1121>' wives with thee <WH802>.

And of every living thing <WH2416> of all flesh <WH1320>, two <WH8147> of every sort shalt thou bring <WH935> into the ark <WH8392>, to keep them alive <WH2421> with thee <WH2145>; they shall be male and female <WH5347>.

Of the birds <WH5775> after their kind <WH4327>, and of the cattle <WH929> after their kind <WH4327>, of every creeping thing <WH7431> of the ground after its kind <WH4327>, two <WH8147> of every sort shall come <WH935> unto thee <WH2421>, to keep them alive.
And take <WH3947> thou unto thee of all food <WH3978> that is eaten <WH398>, and gather <WH622> it to thee <WH402>; and it shall be for food for thee, and for them.
Thus did <WH6213> Noah <WH5146>; according to all that God <WH430> commanded <WH6680> him <WH6213>, so did he.
